column2: In  these  circumstances,  this  Court  is  of the  view that the  Petitioner has  failed

column1: to  make  out  a  prima  facie  case  that the  conduct  of the  learned  Senior  State

column3: in  willful  or  contumacious  disobedience  of  the  judgment  of  this

column2: Court  in  CA  (Writ)  Application  No.  177/2010  and  for that  reason,  this  Court
rejects the application  made  by the Petitioner seeking to amend the caption by
add ing the learned Senior State Counsel as the 13th  Respondent.
